model

Class Car

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractGameObject
      • model.AbstractMovableGameObject
        • model.Car
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollider, IColorable, IDamage, IDrawable, IGameObject, IMovable, ISteerable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NPCar

    public class Car
extends AbstractMovableGameObject
implements ISteerable, IColorable, IDamage
    A game representation of a car.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface utilities.ISteerable
